QuestData.Title: Preserved in Amber
QuestData.Description: Take... this...$B$B<The dying mantid struggles to outstretch his arm. In his mangled grasp rests a metal fork with two long, thin prongs and an ornately jeweled handle.>$B$BAwaken... the Wind-Reaver...$B$BIt is the only way... to end the swarm.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Klaxxi Tuning Fork on the Ancient Amber Chunk in the Terrace of Gurthan.

Objectives.Objective: Klaxxi Tuning Fork used on Amber
